meanings.sent1: She repinned the fabric to make sure it stayed in place.
meanings.sent2: I repinned the note to the bulletin board after it fell off.
meanings.sent3: The tailor repinned the hem multiple times, making it look like a zigzag pattern.
meanings.sent4: The detective repinned the suspect's location on the map, closing in on the criminal.
meanings.sent5: With precision, she repinned the broken clasp on her necklace, restoring it to its former glory.

meanings.definition: To pin (a post or image) to one's own board on a social media platform.
meanings.sent1: She repinned the recipe to her 'Dessert Ideas' board on Pinterest.
meanings.sent2: After finding a beautiful landscape photo, I repinned it to my 'Travel Inspiration' board.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly repinned a picture of a cat wearing sunglasses to his 'Cool Pets' board.
meanings.sent4: The artist repinned a stunning painting to her 'Artistic Creations' board, admiring the talent.
meanings.sent5: Excitedly, she repinned the motivational quote to her 'Positive Vibes' board, spreading inspiration to others.
